solution.text:
From part (i),
Radius of the cone, r\(=_{k}_\,cm\)
From part (ii),
Slant height of the cone, l\(=_{{trunc(((k**2+j**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_\,cm\)
The curved surface area of the cone, CSA\(=\pi rl\)
\(=\pi \times _{k}_ \times _{{trunc(((k**2+j**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow\)CSA\(=_{{trunc((pi_val*k*(k**2+j**2)**Decimal(0.5)),3)}}_\,cm^2\)

content.text: The curved surface area of the cone.
